thread.title: GIACT Unveils New Logo and Website
thread.title_full: GIACT Unveils New Logo and Website

author: admin
title: GIACT Unveils New Logo and Website
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/22/2015 @ 2:20 PM Companies mentioned in this article: GIACT Systems 
DALLAS, Oct. 22, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- GIACT Systems , the leader in providing real-time data for payment risk analysis, has unveiled a new logo and updated website. Conveying the distinct but interconnected nature of its payment risk mitigation solutions, GIACT's new logo and website have been introduced just prior to the company's participation at Money20/20 , October 25-28 in Las Vegas. At the show, GIACT will publicly introduce its new mobile solution, gMOBILE(TM). 
"Since our founding in 2004, the strength and robustness of our solutions have enabled GIACT to perform very well and grow swiftly, even without much focus on our logo and branding," said Melissa Brown , co-founder and CEO of GIACT. "As we continue to expand, and especially as we begin to serve the mobile risk space, we felt it was time to refresh our look in order to communicate more explicitly the intrinsic strengths of our company and the value we bring to our customers. Those characteristics that define who we are as a company--driven, reliable, passionate, visionary, strategic, and exceptional--come through in this new branding and we are excited to unveil it as we head off to Money20/20." 
"GIACT is an extraordinary team of people, who each and every day look to make their customers' businesses more effective and safer," said Ellen Miller, founder and CEO of Insider Marketing, the creative agency that produced GIACT's new brand identity. "We were excited to work with GIACT on this initiative and look forward to seeing how their passion and expertise drives the launch of their mobile solution at Money20/20." 
GIACT will be located in Meeting Room 2755 at The Venetian during Money20/20. 
About GIACT GIACT Systems is a privately held company founded in 2004 by a team of experienced payments, security, and technology experts. We provide information services that prevent fraud and minimize bad debt when accepting payments. We are the leading real-time and proprietary data provider for payments and risk information, with industry leading solutions for verification, authentication, identification and funds confirmation. We currently service more than 1,000 customers and have processed over 1 billion transactions. For more information visit www.giact.com or call 1-866-918-2409. Follow us on LinkedIn and Twitter . 
To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/giact-unveils-new-logo-and-website-300165115.html 
SOURCE GIACT Systems
